feed.title: Chirpy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Chirpy: v0.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(deps): update tiptap packages to v2.0.0-beta.199 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/497
  • fix(deps): update dependency @headlessui/react to v1.7.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/473
  • refactor: move code to packages by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/502
  • chore(deps): update dependency tailwindcss to v3.2.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/501
  • chore(deps): update dependency msw to v0.47.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/424
  • fix(deps): update dependency tailwindcss-box-shadow to v2 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/500
  • fix(deps): update dependency tailwindcss-mso to v1.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/499
  • chore(deps): update dependency typescript to v4.8.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/498
  • fix(rte): remove heading select by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/505
  • fix(deps): update dependency @urql/exchange-graphcache to v5.0.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/503
  • fix(docs): cannot load docs on production by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/512
  • feat(docs): add bottom nav links by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/520
  • fix(deps): update dependency cypress to v10.11.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/508
  • fix(deps): update dependency framer-motion to v7.6.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/509
  • fix(deps): update dependency next-connect to v0.13.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/515
  • chore(deps): update dependency turbo to v1.6.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/518
  • chore(deps): update graphqlcodegenerator monorepo by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/519
  • fix(deps): update dependency graphql-ws to v5.11.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/511
  • fix(deps): update dependency next-plausible to v3.6.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/506
  • fix(deps): update dependency next-axiom to v0.15.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/514
  • fix(deps): update dependency postcss-preset-env to v7.8.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/507
  • chore(deps): update dependency autoprefixer to v10.4.13 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/477
  • fix(deps): update dependency rehype-pretty-code to v0.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/516
  • fix(deps): update dependency github-slugger to v1.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/510
  • fix(deps): update dependency eslint-plugin-storybook to v0.6.7 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/493
  • fix: can't sign-in with email by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/525
  • fix(dashboard): missing the project after creating and show error with duplicated domain by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/527
  • fix: bump to nextjs@13 by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/524
  • fix(analytics): missing map and a11y issues by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/532
  • feat(theme): background color by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/537
  • feat(comment-widget): order by new comments by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/540
  • fix(widget): comment widget disappeared after clicking back button by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/542
  • fix(notification): message alignment by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/544
  • fix(docs): mobile view styles issues by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/545

Full Changelog: https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/compare/v0.1.3...v0.2.0

entry.title: New release for Chirpy: Migrate DB to postgresql
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(docs): add expand animation by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/546
  • feat: add more auth social providers by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/547
  • [BREAKING] refactor: move to tRPC by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/549
  • feat: add announcement banner by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/551
  • chore(deps): update dependency downshift to v6.1.12 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/535
  • fix(comment-preview): can't post a comment and don't query notification messages if user doesn't signin by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/553
  • feat: tinybird analytics by @devrsi0n in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/571
  • chore(deps): update actions/setup-node action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/197
  • chore(deps): update dependency @types/node to v18.16.18 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/577
  • chore(deps): update actions/checkout action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/576
  • fix(deps): update dependency @tremor/react to v3.2.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/pull/578

Full Changelog: https://github.com/devrsi0n/chirpy/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0
